phrs.translation: 滴注法, 滴注, 灌注, 滴注物
灌注, 希望的灌注, 灌输希望
直畅滴注法英语, 直畅滴注法, 直肠滴注, 直肠滴注法

sentences.sentence: The graphical instillation system will then be downloaded from your mirror.
sentences.translation: 然后，从您的镜像中下载图形安装系统。

sentences.sentence: Bar light units can be customized by color, intensity, length, width and instillation position.
sentences.translation: 非标定制说明：可按照颜色，亮度，长宽尺寸，安装孔位定制。

sentences.sentence: Bar lights can be customized by color, intensity, length, width, LED rows and instillation position.
sentences.translation: 非标定制说明：可按照颜色，亮度，长宽尺寸，LED灯排数，安装孔位定制。
